sentence.Network_en: Many a would - be hero died with Excalibur still sheathed upon his belt.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多使用埃克斯卡利伯剑有可能成为英雄的人还是死了,尽管剑鞘还在他们身上.

sentence.Network_en: They called the sword Excalibur, and It'seemed everything they had asked.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们称这把剑为埃克斯卡利伯剑, 它拥有他们所要求的一切力量.
